name: FrankenPuzzler
description:
You barely got stitched together by the Doctor with questionable intentions. You have to escape the castle! On your way you will meet puzzles where considerable sacrifices will have to be made… Defeat the enemies and FIX your wounds before you bleed out. 

No monsters were harmed while making this game.

1. Move with A and D

2. Press Space to jump

3. Press E to attack

4. Press W to climb the ladder

5. Pick a body part to sacrifice to activate buttons and levers. Think before you chop, your movement will be impaired depending on what you pick.

6. If you are stuck, press R to restart.

Sound assets credits:

Background music from z3r0 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD2iUVkyqfuAFvqpdWweTkw
Free sound effects from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/.
Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com/.
